jobDescription: Presales role involving understanding customer needs in the SAAS industry, pitching company products, and working with product development, sales, and marketing teams.  Responsibilities include planning sales strategies, preparing presentations, creating marketing concepts, and responding to RFPs/RFLs.  Building lasting customer relationships and training other sales representatives are also key aspects of the role.
preferredQualifications: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Sales or Marketing
